mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.task_name AS "taskName", a.task_year AS "taskYear", a.task_level AS "taskLevel", a.begin_date AS "beginDate", a.end_date AS "endDate", a.charge_office_id AS "chargeOfficeId", a.partake_office_id AS "partakeOfficeId", a.check_num AS "checkNum", a.check_system_id AS "checkSystemId", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", o7.name AS "charge.name", o8.name AS "partake.name", cs.name AS "checkSystem.name", cs.id AS "checkSystem.id"
LEFT JOIN sys_office o7 ON o7.id = a.charge_office_id LEFT JOIN sys_office o8 ON o8.id = a.partake_office_id LEFT JOIN bas_check_system cs ON cs.id = a.check_system_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bus_task( id, task_name, task_year, task_level, begin_date, end_date, charge_office_id, partake_office_id, check_num, check_system_id, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{taskName}, #{taskYear}, #{taskLevel}, #{beginDate}, #{endDate}, #{chargeOfficeId}, #{partakeOfficeId}, #{checkNum}, #{checkSystemId}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE bus_task SET task_name = #{taskName}, task_year = #{taskYear}, task_level = #{taskLevel}, begin_date = #{beginDate}, end_date = #{endDate}, charge_office_id = #{chargeOfficeId}, partake_office_id = #{partakeOfficeId}, check_num = #{checkNum}, check_system_id = #{checkSystemId}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
